title: Sofia Coppola: A Tribute
description: A retrospective of Sofia Coppola’s films at the Museum of Modern Art.

title: Canstruction 2025
description: An annual design competition where teams create sculptures from unopened cans of food, on display at Brookfield Place.

title: Baby Teeth Film Festival
description: A film festival dedicated to trans, non-binary, and gender queer filmmakers, featuring 27 short films.
address: Various locations: Millennium Film Workshop, Dear Friend Books, Brooklyn Community Pride Center

title: NYC Magic Ensemble
description: A night of magic and mentalism at Young Ethel’s.

title: Golden Spiral Comedy Show
description: A comedy show where set lengths follow the Fibonacci sequence, featuring various comedians.

title: Peer Revue
description: A comedy show featuring real experts giving talks while comedians improvise.

title: Letters + Sodas: LIC Reading Series
description: A night of standup and readings featuring various writers and comedians.

title: Not in My Backyard! A Political Comedy Roundtable
description: A panel of comedians, journalists, and politicians debate local issues in NYC.

title: Judd Apatow in Conversation with Ronny Chieng
description: Judd Apatow shares stories about his career and favorite comedians in a conversation with Ronny Chieng.

title: We Have Fun: A Stand-Up Show
description: Stand-up comedy featuring various comedians at Young Ethel’s.

title: Flash Comedy
description: A comedy show featuring free polaroids of the audience, hosted by Claire Parker and others.

title: Ambush Comedy Show
description: A comedy show at Hellrazor Barber Shop featuring various comedians.

title: Live from NYPL: The Second Estate with Ray D. Madoff and Gary Gulman
description: A conversation with Boston College law professor Ray D. Madoff and comedian Gary Gulman about Madoff's new book, 'The Second Estate: How the Tax Code Made an American Aristocracy.'
address: NYPL Stephen A. Schwarzman Building’s Celeste Auditorium, Midtown

title: Frontiers Lecture at AMNH: Roman Space Telescope
description: Assistant astronomy professor Kishalay De discusses NASA’s Nancy Grace Roman Space Telescope, set to launch in May 2027.
address: American Museum of Natural History, Hayden Planetarium Space Theater, UWS

title: We Love a Theme: A Storytelling Show
description: Performers tell stories at Bailey Swilley’s monthly storytelling show, with a theme of 'Heads Will Roll... Stories About Rage.'

title: Econlol: An Economics-Themed Comedy Show
description: Luke Strathmann hosts comedians and economists to humorously discuss economics and finance.

title: Mother’s Milk Variety Show
description: A variety show featuring comedy, dance, and music performances, encouraging performers to try something new.

title: Dance Bloc NYC
description: Dixon Place’s fifth annual fall dance festival featuring new works from over 20 companies and choreographers.
